languages.text: "Сию минуту исполним, Ваша Светлость! Пожалуйста к нашему воздушному челноку, он недалече, в зарослях. Там и вокс-заклинатель нашей експедиции ожидает".

traits.locale_text: "Сию минуту исполним, Ваша Светлость! Пожалуйста к нашему воздушному челноку, он недалече, в зарослях. Там и вокс-заклинатель нашей експедиции ожидает".
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: "In a jiffy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please be welcome to our flying ferry, it's right over yonder, in the brush. It's also where our expedition's vox-wizard is staying."
languages.original_text: "Сию минуту исполним, Ваша Светлость! Пожалуйста к нашему воздушному челноку, он недалече, в зарослях. Там и вокс-заклинатель нашей експедиции ожидает".

traits.locale_text: "In a jiffy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please help yourself to our flying ferry, it's right over yonder, in the brush. It's also where our expedition's vox-wizard is staying."
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: "In a jiffy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please help yourself to our flying ferry, it's right over yonder, in the brush. It's also where our expedition's vox-wizard is staying."
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: "In a jiffy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please be welcome to our flying ferry, it's right over yonder, in the brush. It's also where our expedition's vox-wizard is staying."
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: "In a jiffy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please be welcome to our flying ferry, it's right over yonder, in the brush. It's also where our expedition's vox-wizard is staying."
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: "In a jiffy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please be welcome to our flying ferry, it's right over yonder, in the brush. It's also where our expedition's vox-wizard is staying."
traits.speaker: OldMan

traits.locale_text: "In a jiffy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please be welcome to our flying ferry, it's right over yonder, in the brush. It's also where our expedition's vox-wizard is staying."
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: “马上就办，{mf|大人|大人}！顺便，欢迎来我们的飞行渡船，就在那边的灌木丛里。我们探险队的音阵巫师也在这个地方。”
languages.original_text: "In a jiffy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please be welcome to our flying ferry, it's right over yonder, in the brush. It's also where our expedition's vox-wizard is staying."

traits.locale_text: “马上就办，{mf|大人|Ladyship}！顺便，欢迎来我们的飞行渡船，就在那边的灌木丛里。我们探险队的音阵巫师也在这个地方。”
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: 「すぐさま用意します、陛下！私共の空飛ぶフェリーに是非どうぞ。向こうの茂みの中にあります！我々の探検隊のヴォクス・ウィザードも滞在しております」
languages.original_text: "In a jiffy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please be welcome to our flying ferry, it's right over yonder, in the brush. It's also where our expedition's vox-wizard is staying."

traits.locale_text: 「すぐさま用意します、陛下！私共の空飛ぶフェリーに是非どうぞ。向こうの茂みの中にあります！我々の探検隊のヴォクス・ウィザードも滞在しております」
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: «¡En un santiamén, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Aproveche nuestro ferry volador. Está ahí, en la espesura. También está nuestro mago de voco».
languages.original_text: "In a jiffy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please be welcome to our flying ferry, it's right over yonder, in the brush. It's also where our expedition's vox-wizard is staying."

traits.locale_text: «¡En un santiamén, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Aproveche nuestro ferry volador. Está ahí, en la espesura. También está nuestro mago de voco».
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: "Das haben wir ratzfatz, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Bitte seid auf unserer fliegenden Fähre willkommen, sie ist gleich dort drüben, um Unterholz. Und der Vox-Hexer unserer Expedition ist auch dort."
languages.original_text: "In a jiffy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please be welcome to our flying ferry, it's right over yonder, in the brush. It's also where our expedition's vox-wizard is staying."

traits.locale_text: "Das haben wir ratzfatz, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Bitte seid auf unserer fliegenden Fähre willkommen, sie ist gleich dort drüben, um Unterholz. Und der Vox-Hexer unserer Expedition ist auch dort."
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: « Pas de souci, Votre Seigneurie ! Vous pouvez vous servir de notre ferry volant, juste là, dans les broussailles. C'est aussi là que se trouve le sorcier-vox de notre expédition. »
languages.original_text: "In a jiffy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please be welcome to our flying ferry, it's right over yonder, in the brush. It's also where our expedition's vox-wizard is staying."

traits.locale_text: « Pas de souci, Votre Seigneurie ! Vous pouvez vous servir de notre ferry volant, juste là, dans les broussailles. C'est aussi là que se trouve le sorcier-vox de notre expédition. »
traits.speaker: OldMan

languages.text: "Derhâl {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Buyurun, sizi uçan gemimizde misafir edelim. Hemen şurada, çalıların orada. Seferimizin voks büyücüsü de orada."
languages.original_text: "In a jiffy, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Please be welcome to our flying ferry, it's right over yonder, in the brush. It's also where our expedition's vox-wizard is staying."

traits.locale_text: "Derhâl {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Buyurun, sizi uçan gemimizde misafir edelim. Hemen şurada, çalıların orada. Seferimizin voks büyücüsü de orada."
traits.speaker: OldMan
